required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Camrelizumab and Apatinib for Neoadjuvant Therapy in Thyroid Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Anti-PD-1 Antibody Camrelizumab Combined With Apatinib for Neoadjuvant Therapy in Locally Advanced Thyroid Cancer: a Phase II Study

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the efficacy and safety of anti-PD-1 antibody Camrelizumab combined with Apatinib for neoadjuvant therapy in locally advanced thyroid cancer.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the time point of 6 weeks
from the first drug administration to within 90 days after surgery

arm_group.description: Apatinib 250mg, po qd, and Camrelizumab 200mg, iv q2w as neoadjuvant treatment. 28 days as one cycle, for at least two cycles.

intervention.description: All patients will receive Camrelizumab and Apatinib for at least two cycles of neoadjuvant treatment
Perform surgery if operable after neoadjuvant therapy
Perform core needle biopsy if inoperable after neoadjuvant therapy
